custom_nodes.author: wouterverweirder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PenPlotter
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes to convert images to pen plotter files

custom_nodes.author: iGavroche
custom_nodes.title: RocM Ninodes
custom_nodes.description: ROCM Optimized Nodes for ComfyUI - High-performance VAE decode and sampling nodes specifically tuned for AMD GPUs with ROCm support, particularly targeting gfx1151 architecture

custom_nodes.author: Aishor
custom_nodes.title: Meta-Sampler Guiado (Seed-WAN)
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI node that implements the Guided Meta-Sampler for video outpainting.

custom_nodes.author: ModelTC
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LightVAE
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LightVAE is a collection of LightX2V VAE custom nodes designed for ComfyUI, supporting high-performance video VAE models including LightVAE and LightTAE.

custom_nodes.author: koirpraw
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI GCP Cloud Storage Integration
custom_nodes.description: This custom node package provides seamless integration between ComfyUI and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Cloud Storage, enabling you to run ComfyUI without relying on instance disk storage. decouple your storage needs from local disks by leveraging GCP's scalable and reliable Cloud Storage service. Models can be saved and loaded directly from Cloud Storage, while outputs and temporary files are automatically synced.

custom_nodes.author: wildminder
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DyPE
custom_nodes.description: DyPE for FLUX. Artifact-free 4K+ image generation.

custom_nodes.author: yeeyou
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI OpenAI Compatible API Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that supports OpenAI-compatible APIs, allowing it to call any large-language-model service compatible with the OpenAI API format (such as vLLM, LM Studio, Ollama, LocalAI, etc.).

custom_nodes.author: heyburns
custom_nodes.title: Image Chooser Classic
custom_nodes.description: A modern re-implementation of the classic [a/cg-image-picker](https://github.com/chrisgoringe/cg-image-picker) ComfyUI nodes. Keep the workflow-pausing image selection experience while shedding the legacy compatibility shims.

custom_nodes.author: ussoewwin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-QwenImageLoraLoader
custom_nodes.description: Standalone ComfyUI custom node for Nunchaku QwenImage LoRA loading functionality.

custom_nodes.author: rsxdalv
custom_nodes.title: TTS WebUI API nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes: TTS WebUI Kokoro, TTS WebUI Chatterbox, TTS WebUI StyleTTS2, TTS WebUI Kitten TTS, TTS WebUI F5-TTS, TTS WebUI Preset
Add API key to environment variable 'TTS_WEBUI_OPENAI_API_KEY'
Alternatively you can write your API key to file 'tts_api_key.txt'
You can also use and/or override the above by entering your API key in the 'api_key' field of each node.

custom_nodes.author: djdarcy
custom_nodes.title: Smart Resolution Calculator
custom_nodes.description: Flexible resolution and latent generation for ComfyUI with toggle-based dimension inputs and automatic calculation of missing values

custom_nodes.author: yannickcruz
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI YSC HighRes-Fix
custom_nodes.description: A custom node for ComfyUI designed to simplify the 'High-Resolution Fix' process. This node takes an input image, performs a direct upscale, and then re-encodes it into a latent image, preparing it for a final sampling pass to add details.

custom_nodes.author: GeekatplayStudio
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI HiTem3D Integration
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive ComfyUI node collection that integrates with the HiTem3D API to generate high-quality 3D models from images, featuring advanced HTML preview capabilities and dynamic content generation.

custom_nodes.author: abdullahceylan
custom_nodes.title: AC Image Optimizer
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node for optimizing and compressing images with support for multiple formats (JPEG, WebP, PNG) and configurable quality settings.

custom_nodes.author: Windecay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_CheckVprediction
custom_nodes.description: A simple node for detecting vrediction, outputs a boolean value, used for logical switching (for example, automatically adding rescalecfg when vrediction model is detected), recommended to be used with if else and other nodes.

custom_nodes.author: eddyhhlure1Eddy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TorchCompileSpeed
custom_nodes.description: Standalone torch.compile optimization node for ComfyUI with speed-focused presets

custom_nodes.author: Fossiel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Fossiel-QoL-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Fossiel-QoL-Nodes is (what will hopefully become) a suite of custom nodes for ComfyUI to improve quality of life. These nodes have been developed for personal use but maybe you’ll find them useful as well.

custom_nodes.author: Dehypnotic
custom_nodes.title: Dehypnotic Save nodes
custom_nodes.description: Save toolkit for audio, image, and video: MP3 audio export with VBR/CBR options, multi-format image saving with workflow/thumbnail metadata, and video + frame encoding (MP4/MKV/WEBM/MOV) — all sharing whitelist-safe paths and rich placeholder templating.

custom_nodes.author: Blacksnowskill
custom_nodes.title: BSS WD14 Batch Tagger
custom_nodes.description: Automatic image tagging using WD14 models with batch processing and GPU acceleration for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Novice_Chen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Simple-IndexTTs
custom_nodes.description: Bilibili IndexTTS2 ComfyUI Version - Auto-downloads models, simple to use.

custom_nodes.author: WWWEN8
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CCXManager
custom_nodes.description: Set to run once, and the SD-PPP Photoshop plugin will be automatically updated when there are updates later, completely eliminating the need for manual updates on the Photoshop side.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_pytorch360convert_video
custom_nodes.description: Video nodes for comfyui-pytorch360convert

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Image Properties SG
custom_nodes.description: View general image properties of image: Dimension, Resolution, Aspect Ratio, Tensor Size (including batch)

custom_nodes.author: scofano
custom_nodes.title: Advanced Text Overlay
custom_nodes.description: Advanced Text Overlay Node for ComfyUI featuring rebuilt rendering logic, precise alignment, custom fonts, and extended styling controls.

custom_nodes.author: cedarconnor
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DiT360
custom_nodes.description: Generate high-fidelity 360-degree panoramic images using the DiT360 diffusion transformer model in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: KursatAs
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui Krs Nodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES: TextEncodeQwenImageEditKrsSimple, TextEncodeQwenImageEditKrsAdvanced, QwenImageEditLatentKrs, ...

custom_nodes.author: yemanou
custom_nodes.title: NABA Image (Gemini REST) Node
custom_nodes.description: Simplified Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview node for ComfyUI. REST-only for stability, two optional reference images, padded aspect ratio resizing (no stretching), and basic sampling controls. All extra debug layers, SDK path, multi-seed, and legacy compatibility code removed to avoid crashes.

custom_nodes.author: leewinder
custom_nodes.title: Mureka API
custom_nodes.description: A set of ComfyUI custom nodes allowing the use of the Mureka API in your workflows

custom_nodes.author: APZmedia
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI DreamLight Node
custom_nodes.description: Comfyui wrapper of Dreamlight by yongliu20

custom_nodes.author: TianDongL
custom_nodes.title: Blind_watermark_Comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A powerful blind watermark plugin for ComfyUI that allows you to embed and extract invisible watermarks in images using frequency domain techniques (DWT-DCT-SVD).

custom_nodes.author: wallen0322
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Wan22FMLF
custom_nodes.description: Multi-frame reference conditioning nodes for Wan2.2 A14B I2V models.

custom_nodes.author: tmode-1960
custom_nodes.title: TA-ComfyUI-Nodes-Pack
custom_nodes.description: Some useful nodes for ComfyUI (model loader & extensions for EBU-LMStudio)

custom_nodes.author: lakkiy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RWImageS3
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI extension that enables seamless integration with AWS S3 storage for reading and saving images directly within your ComfyUI workflows. This extension eliminates the need for manual file transfers by providing direct S3 connectivity for your image processing pipelines.

custom_nodes.author: lihaoyun6
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FlashVSR_Ultra_Fast
custom_nodes.description: Running FlashVSR on lower VRAM without any artifacts.

custom_nodes.title: spin256-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: Nodes to enable easy selection of image/video sizes (width/height) and int/string selectors

custom_nodes.description: Video description custom nodes for ComfyUI powered by advanced vision-language models.

custom_nodes.author: pacchikAI
custom_nodes.title: ImagePromptBatch
custom_nodes.description: A simple comfyui Node for Loading images and thier prompts

custom_nodes.author: charlyad142
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Replicate Image Generation & Edit
custom_nodes.description: This nodepack lets you use several Replicate models for image generation and editing: Qwen Image Edit Plus (Multi-Image) for editing multiple images using reference poses, Qwen Image Edit (Single Image) for single-image edits with text instructions, SeedEdit 3.0 (ByteDance) for advanced prompt-controlled editing, and Seedream 4.0 (ByteDance) for high-quality multi-resolution image generation.

custom_nodes.author: 0xhappydev
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-qwen-image-tools
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for Qwen-Image-Edit with multi-image support, more flexibility around the vision transformer (qwen2.5-vl), custom system prompts, and some other experimental things to come.

custom_nodes.author: PozzettiAndrea
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Grounding
custom_nodes.description: Grounding for dummies, simplest workflow

custom_nodes.author: Antique3e
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Credit Tracker
custom_nodes.description: Simple UI extension to track Modal GPU credits in real-time.

custom_nodes.author: wallen0322
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanAnimate-Enhancer
custom_nodes.description: Enhanced WanAnimateToVideo with multi-dimensional control

custom_nodes.author: alibof96
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DownscaleIRN
custom_nodes.description: A single-node ComfyUI module for Invertible Image Rescaling (IRN) that includes: automatic model download and discovery, BasicSR-based IRN_x2/x3/x4 loading, device/precision control, low-VRAM tiling, safe handling of non-divisible sizes, alpha channel preservation, and built-in bicubic/area fallback.

custom_nodes.author: spiralmountain
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_HDNodes
custom_nodes.description: Custom nodes for ComfyUI that enable video generation using ByteDance's Seedance model via [a/Fal.ai](https://fal.ai/).

custom_nodes.author: apenguin24
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanKeyframing
custom_nodes.description: A powerful ComfyUI custom node collection for keyframe-based video generation and batch image processing. This extension provides advanced tools for creating smooth video sequences from keyframes with intelligent conditioning and latent space interpolation.

custom_nodes.author: balu112121
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI URL Image Loader
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for loading images directly from URLs for AI image generation workflows.

custom_nodes.author: l33chking
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Channel Ops
custom_nodes.description: Comfyui custom node that modifies image channels with various per-channel operations

custom_nodes.author: geltz

custom_nodes.description: Various custom nodes; guidance, latents, sampling, tokenization, etc.

custom_nodes.author: cmeka
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-WanMoEScheduler
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI scheduler that finds the shift value required to align high/low sampling steps with a target sigma boundary.

custom_nodes.author: AhBumm
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_UnfakePy_Warpper
custom_nodes.description: Warp Unfake.py for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: APZmedia
custom_nodes.title: NormalMapLightEstimator
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node for estimating light direction and quality from normal maps using luma masking. The system analyzes surface normals to infer lighting information for downstream tasks like adaptive relighting, directional masking, or stylized effects.

custom_nodes.author: ussoewwin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DistorchMemoryManager
custom_nodes.description: An independent memory management custom node for ComfyUI. Provides Distorch memory management functionality for efficient GPU/CPU memory handling.

custom_nodes.author: ussoewwin
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NunchakuFluxLoraStacker
custom_nodes.description: An advanced LoRA stacker node specifically designed for Nunchaku FLUX models, featuring dynamic UI control for easy and efficient LoRA management.

custom_nodes.title: hvppyflow
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for Automated Workflow

custom_nodes.author: walke2019
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GGUF-VisionLM
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for running GGUF quantized Qwen2.5-VL models using llama.cpp

custom_nodes.author: cybernaut4
custom_nodes.title: Arkl1te's Toolkit
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI by Arkl1te

custom_nodes.author: Analaser
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-RandomTagWeights
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that randomizes tag weights for text prompts. Useful for dynamic prompt generation or creative experimentation in AI image workflows.

custom_nodes.author: guyouyue
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_VideoAutoSplit
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Video Auto-Cropping Tool — includes keyframe detection and automatic segmentation/saving based on keyframes.

custom_nodes.author: OmiX
custom_nodes.title: OmiXdev Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom node for online chat with APIKey to OpenAI ChatGpt4xx... Grok ....

custom_nodes.author: AlcAI-AnimeHaven
custom_nodes.title: AlcAI Nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: AlcAI Nodes is a collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI, a modular interface for image generation with Stable Diffusion. This project focuses on tools optimized for creating anime-style images and stylized effects, inspired by the AnimeHaven universe. It aims to simplify workflows for artists and AI creativity enthusiasts.

custom_nodes.author: rdawgemfl
custom_nodes.title: RDAWG 3D Pack (CUDA 12.8 + PyTorch 2.9.0)
custom_nodes.description: Modern 3D Processing Nodes for ComfyUI - Optimized for CUDA 12.8 + PyTorch 2.9.0

custom_nodes.author: nomadoor
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Dual Panel Subgraph Viewer
custom_nodes.description: A frontend extension for ComfyUI that allows you to open and edit subgraphs in a right-hand panel, instead of replacing the main canvas.

custom_nodes.author: diffussy69
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-curved_weight_schedule
custom_nodes.description: Custom Node for ComfyUI that allows you set a weighted curve to your ControlNet giving you more control over the weight of the model over the course of generation.

custom_nodes.author: smbdsbrain
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PK Load Image Paste
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that extends the standard Load Image functionality with a convenient 'Paste from clipboard' button. This allows you to directly paste images from your clipboard without workflow conflicts, ensuring only images are pasted.

custom_nodes.author: ashtar1984
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-find-perfect-resolution
custom_nodes.description: This custom ComfyUI node, Find Perfect Resolution, calculates an optimal output resolution for an input image while preserving its aspect ratio and ensuring dimensions are divisible by a specified value. It is designed to work seamlessly in ComfyUI workflows, particularly for resizing images with nodes like 'Resize Image v2'.

custom_nodes.author: Sean-Bradley
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Voice Clone
custom_nodes.description: Custom TTS node that clones voice from a reference audio and speaks entered text.

custom_nodes.author: lrzjason
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-LoraUtils
custom_nodes.description: A collection of utility nodes for lora operations in ComfyUI.
